actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: For the relief of Eric N. Anderson, David O. Courtney, Jeffrey L. Homant, Timothy R. McCalley, Stephen V. Perez, Michael P. Ramsey, and Cynthia L. Walerych.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to seven named individuals in full satisfaction of their claims against the United States for retroactive pay and benefits as compensation for the delayed processing of a change in classification grades as air traffic controllers.

titles.title: For the relief of Eric N. Anderson, David O. Courtney, Jeffrey L. Homant, Timothy R. McCalley, Stephen V. Perez, Michael P. Ramsey, and Cynthia L. Walerych.
